page.title: 05Employment Statistics
page.content:
Our employment survey showed: 84% of men hold full time manual jobs e.g. lorry drivers, farmers, mechanics, and joiners. 10% are employed in non-manual jobs such as teachers, solicitors and office managers, etc. 4% of the men have part time manual jobs e.g. building, welding and farming. 2% only have been made redundant and not found other employment.
Of women 45% are full time housewives, 7% are part time housewives and also hold part time jobs. These jobs include shop keepers, canteen workers, cooks and welfare workers. 48% of women have full time jobs, including cleaners, teachers and dressmakers. Some of the women do the farm accounts for their husbands.
